title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in chains & agents.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface, model manager, multi-user).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI with chat history, syntax highlighting, and aliases.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for code completion.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM library for Ollama (Kotlin & Scala friendly) with fluent API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama’s REST API; includes Rails helpers.

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel package providing a service provider and Facade for Ollama.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stacks for Ollama with GPU & CPU variants.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-chatbot-react
summary: Minimal React chatbot component that talks to Ollama over REST.

title: ollama-csharp-sdk
summary: Community-maintained C# / .NET SDK for Ollama with async enumerables.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside your notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that answers users with Ollama models.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript bindings for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Python developers to integrate Ollama models.

title: r/ollama - Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing tips, models, and integrations around Ollama.
